title: Sikkim to be associated with the Union

amendments.description: Made Sikkim an associate state of the Union for progressive realisation of a fully responsible Government in Sikkim. This was based on agreement b.w Chogyal Ruler and Political parties represnting people of Sikkim.

Came after a resol. of Sikkim Assembly of 1975 abolishing institution of the Chogyal.
Therefore, 36th CAA omitted Art 2A and made Sikkim a full-fledged State w. 1 seat in CoS & 1 seat in HoP while also inserting Art 371-F, securing certain Sp. prov.s for Sikkim.
